channel.title: github_trending
channel.description: Latest posts from https://github.com/trending. follow.is: None

item.title: lobehub /lobe-chat
item.description: ü§Ø Lobe Chat - an open-source, modern-design AI chat framework. Supports Multi AI Providers( OpenAI / Claude 3 / Gemini / Ollama / Azure / DeepSeek), Knowledge Base (file upload / knowledge management / RAG ), Multi-Modals (Vision/TTS) and plugin system. One-click FREE deployment of your private ChatGPT/ Claude application.

item.title: usememos /memos
item.description: An open-source, lightweight note-taking solution. The pain-less way to create your meaningful notes. Your Notes, Your Way.

item.title: stanford-oval /storm
item.description: An LLM-powered knowledge curation system that researches a topic and generates a full-length report with citations.

item.title: termux /termux-app
item.description: Termux - a terminal emulator application for Android OS extendible by variety of packages.

item.title: huggingface /lerobot
item.description: ü§ó LeRobot: Making AI for Robotics more accessible with end-to-end learning

item.title: vfsfitvnm /ViMusic
item.description: An Android application for streaming music from YouTube Music.

item.title: meta-llama /llama-recipes
item.description: Scripts for fine-tuning Meta Llama with composable FSDP & PEFT methods to cover single/multi-node GPUs. Supports default & custom datasets for applications such as summarization and Q&A. Supporting a number of candid inference solutions such as HF TGI, VLLM for local or cloud deployment. Demo apps to showcase Meta Llama for WhatsApp & Messenger.

item.title: ToolJet /ToolJet
item.description: Low-code platform for building business applications. Connect to databases, cloud storages, GraphQL, API endpoints, Airtable, Google sheets, OpenAI, etc and build apps using drag and drop application builder. Built using JavaScript/TypeScript. üöÄ

item.title: open-mmlab /Amphion
item.description: Amphion (/√¶mÀàfa…™…ôn/) is a toolkit for Audio, Music, and Speech Generation. Its purpose is to support reproducible research and help junior researchers and engineers get started in the field of audio, music, and speech generation research and development.
